mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.value AS "value", a.label AS "label", a.category AS "category", a.type AS "type", a.description AS "description", a.sort AS "sort", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marry_dict( value, label, category, type, description, sort, parent_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{value}, #{label}, #{category}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE marry_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, category = #{category}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
